channel.title: A Lesson on Apostrophes
channel.description:
I've been browsing these forums enough and this pissing me off. First off, let me show you what an apostrophe is.
'
Amazing isn't it? Now, these are its TWO, AND ONLY TWO PURPOSES (As I know of):
-To show ownership (Lin's something) -To take place of removed characters (Don't)
Here's an example of where you [b]shouldn't[/b] (Hey look, a proper apostrophe!) use one: "Array's" I saw that in the tutorial section. Why? Why is it there? There's no ownership being given to it, and no letters missing from the original word. [b]It's not needed. It's annoying and improper grammar.[/b] Using no apostrophes is better than using one where they're not needed.
[b]Good[/b] The building's windows are clean. Don't do that, please.
[b]Bad[/b] A Lesson on Apostrophe's
The sad thing is I need to post this, when you were learned about them in the 1st Grade for all you Amerikanz. It's rare for me to post two topics in around an hour in the same board, but I seriously got angry when constantly seeing it.
But seriously. Stop adding apostrophes when not supposed to. It makes you look like an idiot.
~Lin

item.title: A Lesson on Apostrophes
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Powerslave, post:1, topic:283200”]“Ammys”.

There’s an example for you.[/quote]
Ammies or amulets, although ‘ammy’ has become a colloquial term.

Read full topic

item.title: A Lesson on Apostrophes
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:8, topic:283189”][quote author=Kihomura link=topic=374220.msg2822133#msg2822133 date=1244680107]
Now you need to make a topic on plural words. I’m getting tired of people saying stuff like “There is many server’s in the download section”

Or “communitys” instead of “communities”, etc.
[/quote]

Newty, for instance?[/quote]
When I read the title, I was thinking about Newty.

Chassy13:

Do you really think anyone is going to pay attention to this? People will always make errors like that or errors such as noone. Unfortunately It Really Annoys Me When People Talk Like This.

Well, it’s an attempt.

Read full topic

item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

I alway’s see the’se grammar error’s all acros’s the forum’s. Thank’s for pointing thi’s out, Lin.

item.title: A Lesson on Apostrophes
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

I’ve been browsing these forums enough and this pissing me off. First off, let me show you what an apostrophe is.

’

Amazing isn’t it? Now, these are its TWO, AND ONLY TWO PURPOSES (As I know of):

-To show ownership (Lin’s something)
-To take place of removed characters (Don’t)

Here’s an example of where you shouldn’t (Hey look, a proper apostrophe!) use one:
“Array’s”
I saw that in the tutorial section. Why? Why is it there? There’s no ownership being given to it, and no letters missing from the original word. It’s not needed. It’s annoying and improper grammar. Using no apostrophes is better than using one where they’re not needed.

Good
The building’s windows are clean.
Don’t do that, please.

Bad
A Lesson on Apostrophe’s

The sad thing is I need to post this, when you were learned about them in the 1st Grade for all you Amerikanz. It’s rare for me to post two topics in around an hour in the same board, but I seriously got angry when constantly seeing it.

But seriously. Stop adding apostrophes when not supposed to. It makes you look like an idiot.

~Lin

Read full topic
